description: With the new JSONSchema validation conflicting policies now fail with webob.exc.HTTPBadRequest as opposed to exception.ValidationError, as it is validated outside of the schema. This should be fixed.
title: Conflicting policies should fail with ValidationError in v3

comments.content: With the new JSONSchema validation conflicting policies now fail with webob.exc.HTTPBadRequest as opposed to exception.ValidationError, as it is validated outside of the schema. This should be fixed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ildiko-vancsa

Fix proposed to branch: master

commit ad0eab8bb2cb7ef50600d3a08a2c201f374304c8
Author: Ildiko Vancsa <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jan 21 17:55:02 2015 +0100

    Fix policy validation in JSONSchema
    
    Fix the JSONSchema for server_group to include the validation of
    conflicting policies. The check in the create function in v3 was
    removed.
